## Catalog Description

Semester course; 3 lecture hours. 3 credits. Prerequisite: graduate student standing and permission of instructor. Discussion of the complexity and computability of problems and programs. Topics will include unsolvability, universal programs and abstract complexity.


## Restrictions; any pre- or co-requisities
 
graduate student standing and permission of instructor.

Discussion of the complexity and computability of problems and programs. Topics will include unsolvability, universal programs and abstract complexity.
